verses.text: Now it came to pass in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w*, of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w royal|strong="H4410"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, even \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* with him, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* to \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*; and there they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* in \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*.

Then \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, and the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that were with him, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him, whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* had made \w governor|strong="H6485"\w* over the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* also \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that were with him, \add even\add* with \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, at \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, and the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* that were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* there, \add and\add* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

And it came to pass the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* after he had \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add*,

That there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* from \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, from \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, and from \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \add even\add* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, having their \w beards|strong="H2206"\w* \w shaven|strong="H1548"\w*, and their \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*, and having \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* themselves, with \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* and \w incense|strong="H3828"\w* in their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* them, \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* all \w along|strong="H1980"\w* as he \w went|strong="H1980"\w*: and it came to pass, as he \w met|strong="H6298"\w* them, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w*.\f + \fr 41.6 \ft weeping…: Heb. in going and weeping\f*

And it was \add so\add*, when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, that \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* them, \add and cast them\add* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, he, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \add were\add* with him.

But \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* among them that \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, \w Slay|strong="H4191"\w* us not: for we \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w treasures|strong="H4301"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, and of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, and of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and of \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*. So he \w forbare|strong="H2308"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* them not \w among|strong="H8432"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

Now the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w* wherein \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* had \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* all the dead \w bodies|strong="H6297"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, whom he had \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w because|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, \add was\add* it which \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \add and\add* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* it with \add them that were\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.\f + \fr 41.9 \ft because…: or, near Gedaliah: Heb. by the hand, or, by the side of Gedaliah\f*

Then \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* carried away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* all the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \add even\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* in \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, whom \w Nebuzar-adan|strong="H5018"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* had \w committed|strong="H6485"\w* to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w*: and \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* carried them away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*, and \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* to go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*.

¶ But when \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* that \add were\add* with him, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*,

Then they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him by the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* that \add are\add* in \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*.

Now it came to pass, \add that\add* when all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which \add were\add* with \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* that \add were\add* with him, then they were \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.

So all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* had carried away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* from \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* cast \w about|strong="H5437"\w* and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* unto \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*.

But \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* with \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*.

Then \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* that \add were\add* with him, all the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* whom he had \w recovered|strong="H7725"\w* from \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, from \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \add that\add* he had \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w*, \add even\add* \w mighty|strong="H1397"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and the \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, and the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*, whom he had brought \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*:

And they \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and dwelt \w in|strong="H3427"\w* the \w habitation|strong="H1628"\w* of \w Chimham|strong="H3643"\w*, which is \w by|strong="H0681"\w* \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

\w Because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: for they were \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of them, because \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* had \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w*, whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* made \w governor|strong="H6485"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
